mapper.select: SELECT CODE_NO , LANGUAGE_NAME , LANGUAGE_CODE , USE_YN , INSERT_ID , date_format(insert_date , '%Y-%m-%d %T' )as INSERT_DATE FROM XBT_LANGUAGE_CODE_MASTER
SELECT CODE_NO , LANGUAGE_NAME , LANGUAGE_CODE , USE_YN , INSERT_ID , date_format(insert_date , '%Y-%m-%d %T' )as INSERT_DATE FROM XBT_LANGUAGE_CODE_MASTER WHERE CODE_NO = #{codeNo}

SELECT XUG.UNIT_GROUP_NO, /*코드번호*/ XUG.UNIT_GROUP_CD, /*물품코드분류*/ GROUP_NAME , /*물품분류명칭*/ GROUP_DESC,/*물품분류설명*/ ACTION_DIV,/*ACTION구분*/ USE_YN,/*사용여부*/ OPEN_YN,/*개봉여부*/ PASS_YN,/*통과여부*/ INSERT_DATE,/*등록일*/ INSERT_ID,/*등록자*/ UPDATE_DATE,/*수정일*/ UPDATE_ID,/*수정자*/ PARENT_UNIT_GROUP_CD,/*상위물품분류코드*/ XUGI.IMG_FILE, LANGUAGE_CODE FROM XBT_UNIT_GROUP XUG INNER JOIN XBT_UNIT_GROUP_IMG XUGI ON XUG.UNIT_GROUP_CD = XUGI.UNIT_GROUP_CD AND XUG.LANGUAGE_CODE = #{languageCode} ORDER BY XUG.UNIT_GROUP_CD ASC

SELECT XUG.UNIT_GROUP_NO, /*코드번호*/ XUG.UNIT_GROUP_CD, /*물품코드분류*/ GROUP_NAME , /*물품분류명칭*/ GROUP_DESC,/*물품분류설명*/ ACTION_DIV,/*ACTION구분*/ USE_YN,/*사용여부*/ OPEN_YN,/*개봉여부*/ PASS_YN,/*통과여부*/ INSERT_DATE,/*등록일*/ INSERT_ID,/*등록자*/ UPDATE_DATE,/*수정일*/ UPDATE_ID,/*수정자*/ PARENT_UNIT_GROUP_CD,/*상위물품분류코드*/ LANGUAGE_CODE, (SELECT IMG_FILE FROM XBT_UNIT_GROUP_IMG WHERE UNIT_GROUP_CD= XUG.UNIT_GROUP_CD) AS IMG_FILE FROM XBT_UNIT_GROUP XUG WHERE XUG.LANGUAGE_CODE = #{languageCode} AND XUG.UNIT_GROUP_CD = #{unitGroupCd}

SELECT UNIT_INFO_NO , UNIT_SCAN_ID , UNIT_ID /*물품아이디*/ , UNIT_GROUP_CD/*뭎품그룹코드*/ , (SELECT GROUP_NAME FROM XBT_UNIT_GROUP where UNIT_GROUP_CD = XUI.UNIT_GROUP_CD and LANGUAGE_CODE = #{languageCode}) as UNIT_GROUP_NAME /*뭎품그룹코드*/ , UNIT_NAME /*물품명*/ , UNIT_DESC /*물품설명*/ , USE_YN/*사용여부*/ , XUI.LANGUAGE_CODE FROM XBT_UNIT_INFO XUI WHERE XUI.LANGUAGE_CODE = #{languageCode}

SELECT UNIT_INFO_NO , UNIT_SCAN_ID , UNIT_ID /*물품아이디*/ , UNIT_GROUP_CD/*뭎품그룹코드*/ , (SELECT GROUP_NAME FROM XBT_UNIT_GROUP where UNIT_GROUP_CD = XUI.UNIT_GROUP_CD and LANGUAGE_CODE = #{languageCode}) as UNIT_GROUP_NAME /*뭎품그룹코드*/ , UNIT_NAME /*물품명*/ , UNIT_DESC /*물품설명*/ , USE_YN/*사용여부*/ , XUI.LANGUAGE_CODE ,(SELECT REAL_IMG FROM XBT_UNIT_IMG_INFO_MASTER WHERE XUI.UNIT_SCAN_ID = UNIT_SCAN_ID) AS REAL_IMG ,(SELECT FRONT_IMG FROM XBT_UNIT_IMG_INFO_MASTER WHERE XUI.UNIT_SCAN_ID = UNIT_SCAN_ID) AS FRONT_IMG ,(SELECT SIDE_IMG FROM XBT_UNIT_IMG_INFO_MASTER WHERE XUI.UNIT_SCAN_ID = UNIT_SCAN_ID) AS SIDE_IMG ,(SELECT THREED_IMG FROM XBT_UNIT_IMG_INFO_MASTER WHERE XUI.UNIT_SCAN_ID = UNIT_SCAN_ID) AS THREED_IMG FROM XBT_UNIT_INFO XUI WHERE XUI.LANGUAGE_CODE = #{languageCode} AND UNIT_ID = #{unitId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM XBT_UNIT_IMG_INFO_MASTER WHERE UNIT_SCAN_ID = #{unitScanId}

SELECT T1.BAG_SCAN_NO, T1.BAG_SCAN_ID, T1.UNIT_ID,/*정답물품아이디*/ (SELECT UNIT_NAME FROM XBT_UNIT_INFO WHERE UNIT_ID = T1.UNIT_ID) as unitName,/*정답물품명*/ T3.OPEN_YN,/*개봉여부*/ T3.PASS_YN,/*통과여부*/ T3.ACTION_DIV, T3.ACTION_DIV_NAME, T1.STUDY_LVL, /*학습레벨*/ T1.USE_YN ,/*사용여부*/ T1.INSERT_ID, T1.INSERT_DATE FROM XBT_BAG_INFO T1 LEFT JOIN XBT_UNIT_GROUP T3 ON T1.UNIT_GROUP_CD = T3.UNIT_GROUP_CD AND T3.LANGUAGE_CODE = 'kor' ORDER BY BAG_SCAN_ID ASC

SELECT T1.BAG_SCAN_NO, T1.BAG_SCAN_ID, T1.USE_YN, T2.IMG_REAL, T2.IMG_FRONT, T2.IMG_SIDE, T2.IMG_FRONT_COLLAR, T2.IMG_FRONT_ORGANISM, T2.IMG_FRONT_COLLAR_OUTLINE, T2.IMG_FRONT_COLLAR_REVERSAL, T2.IMG_FRONT_COLLAR_BW_RATE_1, T2.IMG_FRONT_COLLAR_BW_RATE_2, T2.IMG_FRONT_COLLAR_BW_RATE_3, T2.IMG_FRONT_COLLAR_BW_RATE_4, T2.IMG_FRONT_COLLAR_BW_RATE_5, T2.IMG_FRONT_COLLAR_BW_RATE_6, T2.IMG_FRONT_BW, T2.IMG_FRONT_MINERALS, T2.IMG_FRONT_BW_OUTLINE, T2.IMG_FRONT_BW_REVERSAL, T2.IMG_FRONT_BW_BW_RATE_1, T2.IMG_FRONT_BW_BW_RATE_2, T2.IMG_FRONT_BW_BW_RATE_3, T2.IMG_FRONT_BW_BW_RATE_4, T2.IMG_FRONT_BW_BW_RATE_5, T2.IMG_FRONT_BW_BW_RATE_6, T2.IMG_SIDE_COLLAR, T2.IMG_SIDE_ORGANISM, T2.IMG_SIDE_COLLAR_OUTLINE, T2.IMG_SIDE_COLLAR_REVERSAL, T2.IMG_SIDE_COLLAR_BW_RATE_1, T2.IMG_SIDE_COLLAR_BW_RATE_2, T2.IMG_SIDE_COLLAR_BW_RATE_3, T2.IMG_SIDE_COLLAR_BW_RATE_4, T2.IMG_SIDE_COLLAR_BW_RATE_5, T2.IMG_SIDE_COLLAR_BW_RATE_6, T2.IMG_SIDE_BW, T2.IMG_SIDE_MINERALS, T2.IMG_SIDE_BW_OUTLINE, T2.IMG_SIDE_BW_REVERSAL, T2.IMG_SIDE_BW_BW_RATE_1, T2.IMG_SIDE_BW_BW_RATE_2, T2.IMG_SIDE_BW_BW_RATE_3, T2.IMG_SIDE_BW_BW_RATE_4, T2.IMG_SIDE_BW_BW_RATE_5, T2.IMG_SIDE_BW_BW_RATE_6 FROM XBT_BAG_INFO T1 INNER JOIN XBT_BAG_IMG_INFO T2 ON T1.BAG_SCAN_ID = T2.BAG_SCAN_ID AND T1.BAG_SCAN_ID = #{bagScanId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM XBT_BAG_IMG_INFO WHERE BAG_SCAN_ID = #{bagScanId}

SELECT A.BAG_SCAN_ID /*가방촬영ID*/ , A.SEQ /*순번*/ , A.UNIT_ID /*물품ID*/ , B.UNIT_NAME /*물품명*/ , B.UNIT_DESC /*물품설명*/ , A.INSERT_DATE /*등록일시*/ , A.INSERT_ID /*등록자*/ , A.INSERT_DATE /*수정일*/ , C.ACTION_DIV /*ACTION구분*/ , C.OPEN_YN /*개봉여부*/ , C.PASS_YN /*통과여부*/ , A.ANSWER_ITEM /*정답여부*/ FROM XBT_BAG_CONST_UNIT A INNER JOIN XBT_UNIT_INFO B INNER JOIN XBT_UNIT_GROUP C ON A.UNIT_ID=B.UNIT_ID AND B.UNIT_GROUP_CD=C.UNIT_GROUP_CD AND A.BAG_SCAN_ID = #{bagScanId} ORDER BY BAG_SCAN_ID DESC

SELECT T1.UNIT_SCAN_ID , T1.UNIT_ID /*물품아이디*/ , T1.UNIT_GROUP_CD/*뭎품그룹코드*/ , T1.UNIT_NAME /*물품명*/ , T1.UNIT_DESC /*물품설명*/ , T1.USE_YN/*사용여부*/ , T2.OPEN_YN , T2.PASS_YN , FN_CODE_NAME('0005', T2.ACTION_DIV,'KOR') AS actionDiv FROM XBT_UNIT_INFO T1 JOIN XBT_UNIT_GROUP T2 ON T1.UNIT_GROUP_CD = T2.UNIT_GROUP_CD WHERE T1.LANGUAGE_CODE = #{languageCode}

choose.when: SELECT concat('G', LPAD(cast(right(IFNULL(MAX(UNIT_GROUP_CD), '0'), 6) as DECIMAL)+1+1, 6 , '0')) AS seqId FROM XBT_UNIT_GROUP
SELECT concat('U', LPAD(cast(right(IFNULL(MAX(UNIT_ID), '0'), 6) as DECIMAL)+1+1, 6 , '0')) AS seqId FROM XBT_UNIT_INFO
SELECT concat('X', LPAD(cast(right(IFNULL(MAX(BAG_SCAN_ID), '0'), 6) as DECIMAL)+1+1, 6 , '0')) AS seqId FROM XBT_BAG_INFO

mapper.update: UPDATE XBT_UNIT_INFO SET UNIT_GROUP_CD=#{unitGroupCd}, UNIT_NAME=#{unitName}, UNIT_DESC=#{unitDesc}, STUDY_LVL=#{studyLvl}, USE_YN=#{useYn}, UPDATE_ID=#{updateId}, UPDATE_DATE=now() WHERE UNIT_ID = #{unitId} AND LANGUAGE_CODE = #{languageCode}
UPDATE XBT_UNIT_IMG_INFO_MASTER SET REAL_IMG=#{realImg}, FRONT_IMG=#{frontImg}, SIDE_IMG=#{sideImg}, UPDATE_DATE=now() WHERE UNIT_SCAN_NO=#{unitScanNo}
